title: wtf i love veigar now
body:
https://2.bp.blogspot.com/-vK1SYT0Nz8Q/W9HeIlTBciI/AAAAAAABJto/4rLumZ8sVKsnPhpdQVsu7MJwUYGjckpqgCEwYBhgL/s1600/image%2B%252816%2529.jpg

this art is so badass tbh, my new desktop wallpaper
{{sticker:sg-jinx}}
Is there a higher res version of this anywhere?

replies.body: The "**tiny**" Master of Evil. Either Rito lied or he chugged one too many Elixirs of Iron.

its an illusion spell
he ruins it by giggling

Or maybe he tricked Lulu into becoming his ally? Or maybe the illusion spell is making him small and here he revealed his true self?
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}
The short story, read the short story.

My boi Veigar finally receives some love from Riot :3 {{item:3070}} {{champion:45}}
VFX update, story update

Our time has come, though it has barely begun.

_VU, when?!_
VU after mordekaiser's plz, it makes sense and morde needs it more

> [{quoted}](name=A Superb Villain,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hBuHb5Ek,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2018-10-25T19:11:14.265+0000)
>
> Our time has come, though it has barely begun.
> 
> _VU, when?!_

Maybe one day, brother. Maybe one day.
I think QmegaSquadVeigar was referring to the updated visuals for his spells. They got shipped along updated ones for Vi, Lee and (I think) J4.

I kinda just feel bad for him, he tries so hard to be evil but everything just backfires and because of his size no one takes him seriously.......seriously in that new story he gets accused of making milk go sour while his display of making lightning fall is completely ignored {{sticker:sg-kiko}}

The peasant people in this image
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/7/74/Veigar_Bolehem_Tower.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190318235735
look a lot like the ones in this image
https://vignette.wikia.nocookie.net/leagueoflegends/images/5/55/Demacia_Turmoil.jpg/revision/latest?cb=20190125153900
They need full VGUs not just VU (Morde and Pantheon Veigar only needs a model update, his abilities got updated recently)

Looks like they made Viegar the final boss.    
#Heeeeey, wait a minute...

> [{quoted}](name=Nabil17778,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=hBuHb5Ek,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2018-10-25T17:34:29.304+0000)
>
> What's that? New veigar's splash art? :0

It should be. It's from his new lore story.

Uhhh..does anyone see Helmet Bro?


Cool art btw!
